body_html:
re-cap of in-person conversation:

  • let's revert the getDefaultEngine change. The actual fix here is subtle and will require changes so that getDefaultEngine returns the python engine if python has been added to the process.
  • do not worry about the NO_PYTHON in interpreter.cpp, I have a separate PR that will handle that.
body_text:
re-cap of in-person conversation:

let's revert the getDefaultEngine change. The actual fix here is subtle and will require changes so that getDefaultEngine returns the python engine if python has been added to the process.
do not worry about the NO_PYTHON in interpreter.cpp, I have a separate PR that will handle that.
body:
re-cap of in-person conversation: 

* let's revert the getDefaultEngine change. The actual fix here is subtle and will require changes so that getDefaultEngine returns the python engine if python has been added to the process.
* do not worry about the NO_PYTHON in interpreter.cpp, I have a separate PR that will handle that.
